item.title: R Markdown Page
item.description: true This page provides an example of using R Markdown. x <- 1:10 y <- round(rnorm(10, x, 1), 2) df <- data.frame(x, y) df ## x y ## 1 1 0.55 ## 2 2 0.79 ## 3 3 3.09 ## 4 4 3.54 ## 5 5 6.03 ## 6 6 7.52 ## 7 7 8.03 ## 8 8 8.27 ## 9 9 8.81 ## 10 10 9.19
